content:
During the last day, on March 26, the enemy fired at Kherson once again, as a result of the attack, three people were injured.

About thisinformsHead of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin.

"Last day, the enemy fired at Tyaginka, Berislav, Novoberislav, Dnipro, Kizomis, Kachkarivka, Republican, Radomian, Golden Beam, Lviv and Kherson," he said.

According to the head of the Ova, the Russian military kissed the residential quarters of the settlements of the region, resulting in damaged high -rise buildings and 2 private homes.

"A hits, a bus and a car were also recorded," Alexander Proudin added.

As reported by the Armyinform, the enemy per day made 386 beats in the Zaporozhye region,There is destructionHousing and infrastructure.
title: The enemy continues to attack the civilian population of Kherson region: there are wounded
description: The chief of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin informs about it. “Last day enemy ...
author: Army Inform
